title: 2 "Romance Dawn Story"Transliteration: "Romansu Dōn Sutōrī" (Japanese:ロマンス ドーン ストーリー) September 21, 2008(2008-09-21)
transformers_text: 2 Romance Dawn Story Transliteration Romans u D n S ut r Japanese September 21 2008 2008 09 21 In search for food for his crew Luffy arrives at a port town defeating a pirate named Crescent Moon G ally on the way He meets a girl named Silk in town who was abandoned by attacking pirates as a baby and raised by the mayor which has caused her to value the town as her treasure The villagers mistake Luffy for G ally and capture him just as the real G ally returns G ally throws Luffy in the water and plans to destroy the town but Silk saves him and Luffy goes after G ally His crew arrives to help him and with his help he recovers the treasure for the town gets some food and destroys G ally's ship
